title: Family Chiropractic & Acupuncture Center - Chiropractor in Fairfield, CA US
description: Family Chiropractic & Acupuncture Center is your local Chiropractor in Fairfield serving all of your needs. Call us today at (707) 427-1222 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Family Chiropractic and Acupuncture Center offers an array of cutting edge natural health care options. From Chiropractic care with soft tissue techniques to manual adjustments, Acupuncture, Acupressure and Herbal Medicine. We also have a physiotherapy department that includes electrotherapy and laser light treatment. Dr. Gray and Dr. Bocci use a variety of techniques and are both qualified medical examiners for the state of California with complete knowledge of the workers compensation system. Our facility also offers sport physicals. Family Chiropractic and Acupuncture Center is here to help you find an alternative approach to optimum health. If you are new to our website, please feel free to discover and learn about chiropractic wellness. If you are interested in starting your journey towards wellness please subscribe to our award winning newsletter. If you are already a newsletter subscriber, please explore the member wellness section of our website for wellness articles, resources, and health facts---specifically targeted by Dr. Gary Bocci to your wellness needs and interests. It's Your Life... Live it in Health! Dr. Gary Bocci Fairfield Chiropractor | Family Chiropractic & Acupuncture Center | (707) 427-1222 2801 Waterman Blvd. Ste. 260
